subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Glenn Caruso has transformed St. Thomas into a powerhouse that will face 10-time national champion Mount Union in the Amos Alonzo Stagg Bowl on Friday.
snippet: Glenn Caruso has transformed St. Thomas into a powerhouse that will face 10-time national champion Mount Union in the Amos Alonzo Stagg Bowl on Friday.
